A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Atrocious film\, vacuous\, puerile\, nonsensical\, nihilistic\, feminazi PC claptrap. It's utterly unctuous to the twilight and Fifty Shades audience. Rian Johnson can't direct his way out of a paper bag. By far the worst film in the franchise\, a feat thought impossible. Kathleen Kennedy should be fired.
